ygData.subject: RE: What to do with a bad bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I might not have done the exact same thing to the purchased character, but I don t find anything wrong with it either. You want to cheat and cut in line,
ygData.messageBody:
> Saw this on bard message board - made me really
> sick to read it:

I might not have done the exact same thing to the
'purchased' character, but I don't find anything
wrong with it either. You want to cheat and cut
in line, you deserve whatever you get by doing
so. There's no way in Norrath that I'd even
consider helping a level 35 player that didn't
know where the Karana's were or that Giants
don't 'give quests'. They deserve anything evil
that happens to them in the game.

By the time I was level 5 I knew where every
zone in the game was. I hadn't been to them
all of course, but I knew where they were. By
level 7 I'd made the trip from Felwithe to
Erudin. A level 35 that didn't know? Hrmph.

I don't help cheaters. If you want to, feel
free. But you're doing nothing more than
letting them know it's ok to be an idiot.
